I'm trying to play this with my friend who bought Dead Island...can anyone help? :)

Let me save you hours of frustration if you are trying to play this on a LAN. First off, this is an old version so its useless. However the torrent contains a working copy of Smartsteam. Google "Dead Island Master Update 1.3.0 v3!!! DLC BLOODBATH REPACKED 7 patch into one+exp balance+COOP!! " to find the real working patch for the original reloaded release of the game. Once that is patched follow these steps.

1. Install Steam. 
2. Create a fake steam account for each player on the lan. 
3. Winrar smartsteam from this torrent into the steam directory.
4. run smartsteam from each computer.
5. run Dead island.
6. Start a game, switch online option from internet to LAN.
7. Have each player start a game and use the Game Lobby option to find your game. They must have completed the tutorial and be on at least Act 1 to do this.

hope this helps.
